product_title: Hudson Classic Slim Fit Straight Leg Chino Pants
product_description: A bit of stretch eases the slim fit of versatile flat-front chinos tailored with a modern, straight-leg profile.
product_details_and_care:
A bit of stretch eases the slim fit of versatile flat-front chinos tailored with a modern, straight-leg profile.
34" inseam; 14 1/2" leg opening; 10 1/2" front rise
Zip fly with button closure
Front slant pockets; back welt pocket; back button-welt pocket
98% cotton, 2% spandex
Machine wash, dry flat
Imported
Item #6099078
product_size_info:
True to size.
Comfortable through the hip and thigh.
Tailored from the knee to ankle.
